description.value:
Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

You can use Opportune Riposte against an enemy who fails at a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike} against you (not just critically fails), provided you have both damaged that creature with a finisher on your last turn and currently have a circumstance bonus to AC from the parry weapon trait, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)]{Dueling Parry}, or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Twin Parry]{Twin Parry}.
